name: Priyansh Agarwal
certifications: Machine Learning Specialization by DeepLearning.AI & Stanford

education.degree: B.Tech in Computer Science with Specialization in Software Engineering

work_experience.title: Machine Learning Engineer & Artificial Intelligence Intern
responsibilities: Designed a Plugin of Chatbot for Wordpress website using PHP, CSS, JS, REST API, Local Server LLM, LM STUDIO.
Trained a Large Language Model using Langchain, Google Gemini, Pinecone for Q/A using Multiple PDFs data.

work_experience.title: Samsung Prism Research Intern
responsibilities: Developed a LLM for Sales Enhancement for customer Engagement for Samsung Products.
Steered a team of 4 to train a LLM Llama 2 that can handle data such as CSV, PDF and compared other LLMs.

projects.title: Samsung AI Sales Chatbot
projects.description: Enhanced Samsung customer engagement by integrating Llama 2 LLM using Langchain, Python, TensorFlow, fine-tuning techniques like LORA. Conducted a comparative analysis of GPT-3 and Gemini using PyTorch and Transformers.

projects.title: Stock Price Prediction
projects.description: Model for Predicting Stock Prices using Machine Learning, Keras, TensorFlow, Algorithm LSTM with 96% accuracy.

projects.title: Face Recognition & Detection
projects.description: Designed a platform for Real time Face Recognition using Machine Learning, OpenCV, Tensorflow, Keras, CNN.

achievements.title: Next Gen AI's HackSteet Hackathon - Project (Dr.Fit)
achievements.description: Led a team to create a platform providing diet plans according to health conditions using scikit-learn, Keras.

achievements.title: BlockChain's Layer Hackathon - Project (JusticePal)
achievements.description: Innovated a law-based app solving problems related to wrongful activities by Traffic Police using HTML, NLP, JavaScript.

achievements.title: Publicity Team Head
achievements.description: Contributed to the publicity of numerous club events and increased response rates via C2Cs, Instagram, and other platforms.
